publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill,

notesStmt.note: Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
Setting a 6 day curfew in London for apprentices and other disorderly persons.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
